channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Digital Editions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe Systems Incorporated -- Digital Editions

item.title: CVE-2017-3091|2024-09-17T03:33:51.166Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions 4.5.4 and earlier versions 4.5.4 and earlier have an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-11278|2024-09-17T00:16:29.047Z -- adobe%20systems%20incorporated -- digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions 4.5.4 and earlier has an exploitable memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
